name: Electrical Services
description: Providers of electrical installation, maintenance, and repair services for residential, commercial, and industrial clients, including electrical contractors, electricians, and electrical engineers.

name: Plumbing Services
description: Companies offering installation, maintenance, and repair services for pipes, fixtures, and appliances, including plumbers, pipefitters, and hydronic heating specialists.

name: HVAC Services
description: Providers of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning installation, maintenance, and repair services for residential, commercial, and industrial clients, including HVAC contractors and technicians.

name: Construction Services
description: Companies engaged in building, renovating, and repairing structures, including general contractors, builders, and construction managers.

name: Landscaping and Lawn Care Services
description: Providers of outdoor maintenance and beautification services, including lawn care, landscaping, tree care, and gardening companies.

name: Pest Control Services
description: Companies offering services to control and eliminate pests, including exterminators, pest management professionals, and wildlife control specialists.

name: Locksmith Services
description: Providers of lock installation, repair, and maintenance services, including locksmiths, key makers, and security system specialists.

name: Appliance Repair Services
description: Companies offering repair and maintenance services for household and commercial appliances, including appliance technicians and repair specialists.

name: Garage Door Services
description: Providers of installation, repair, and maintenance services for garage doors and openers, including garage door technicians and installers.

name: Handyman Services
description: Companies offering general repair and maintenance services for homes and buildings, including handymen, maintenance technicians, and repair specialists.

name: Masonry Services
description: Providers of masonry installation, repair, and restoration services, including masons, bricklayers, and stoneworkers.

name: Roofing Services
description: Companies offering installation, repair, and maintenance services for roofs, including roofers, roofing contractors, and roofing specialists.

name: Siding Services
description: Providers of siding installation, repair, and maintenance services, including siding contractors, installers, and repair specialists.

name: Window and Door Services
description: Companies offering installation, repair, and maintenance services for windows and doors, including window and door installers, repair specialists, and replacement companies.

name: Flooring Services
description: Providers of flooring installation, repair, and maintenance services, including flooring contractors, installers, and repair specialists.

name: Painting Services
description: Companies offering painting and coating services for residential, commercial, and industrial clients, including painters, painting contractors, and coating specialists.

name: Exterior Cleaning Services
description: Providers of exterior cleaning services, including power washing, window cleaning, and gutter cleaning companies.
